carousel.descricao: Rick and Morty Season 5 airs June 20th, 2020!
I'm Mr. Meeseeks, look at me!
Rick and Morty Season 1 aired on December 2th, 2013!

episodios.descricao: Rick takes Morty on a trip to another dimension to find seeds for mega-trees, while Jerry and Beth argue over Rick's influence on their son.
Rick creates a device to make family dog Snuffles smarter, but it goes poorly. Rick and Morty invade the dreams of Morty's math teacher.
Morty ends up at a bizarre theme park of infectios diseases located inside of a homeless man. Jerry's parensts introdice their new mutual lover.
